EmailTemplate.description: This template can be used to inform customers that there is a change in their TE sales contact persons
EmailTemplate.name: New Sales Contact
EmailTemplate.subject: New Sales Contact at TE Connectivity
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
New Sales Contact at TE Connectivity Dear {!Contact.Name},
This is to inform you that {!Contact.OwnerFullName} has left TE Connectivity with short notice. For any questions and support are you welcome to contact me or Holger Müller, h.mueller@te.com (Account Manager for TE Rail). Until we have found a solution for a dedicated support after Adrian will I assign your requests to another Sales person within the German TE Rail Sales Team.
Let me know if you have any questions about this and I and the TE Rail sales team are looking forward to support you.
Kind regards Robert Ullström Sales Manager TE Rail Communication and Industrial Solutions +46 709 675027 tel +46 8 5072 5227 fax rullstrom@te.com
www.te.com
Tyco Electronics Svenska AB a TE Connectivity Ltd company VAT SE556111808301
